name: Foot-and-Mouth Disease
description: Highly contagious viral disease causing vesicles in cloven-hoofed animals.
relevance: Critical for trade and biosecurity monitoring.
geographicalIncidence: Endemic pockets globally; close surveillance in border regions.

name: Bovine Respiratory Disease
description: Multifactorial respiratory syndrome impacting feedlot performance.
relevance: Major economic losses in beef and dairy systems.
geographicalIncidence: Global; higher incidence in intensive production.

name: Mastitis
description: Inflammation of the udder typically due to bacterial infection.
relevance: Impacts milk quality and animal welfare.

name: African Swine Fever
description: Severe viral hemorrhagic disease of pigs with high mortality.
geographicalIncidence: Multiple outbreaks in Europe, Asia, Africa.

name: Avian Influenza (HPAI)
description: Highly pathogenic avian influenza causing respiratory and systemic signs.
relevance: Zoonotic risk and major production losses.
